---
title: "Controlling False Discovery Rate with Adjusted p values"
output: html_notebook
 ---

```{r}

xbar = rep(0, 1000)
N = 100 # number of non-zero means
mu = 2 #non 0 mean
xbar[1:N] = mu



alpha = seq(from=0,to=1,by=.01)
FDmlist= c()
TDmlist = c()
FPmlist= c()
TPmlist = c()
for ( j in 1:length(alpha)){
  FDlist = c()
TDlist = c()
  FPlist = c()
TPlist = c()

 for (i in 1:1000){
  z = rnorm(1000, xbar, 1)#1,000 z scores
p = 2*pnorm(-abs(z)) #  p values
discovery = p < alpha[j]
TD = sum (discovery)
TTD =sum(p[1:N]<alpha[j])
FDR = (TD-TTD)/TD
TDR = TTD/TD
FPR = (TD-TTD)/(1000-N)
TPR = TTD/ N
FDlist[i]= FDR
TDlist[i]=TDR
FPlist[i]= FPR
TPlist[i]=TPR
 }

FDmlist[j]= mean(FDlist)
TDmlist[j]=mean(TDlist)
FPmlist[j]= mean(FPlist)
TPmlist[j]=mean(TPlist)
}

plot(FDmlist,TDmlist, main="False Discovery Rate vs True Discovery rate",
  xlab="False Discovery rate", ylab="True Discovery rate")
plot(FPmlist,TPmlist, main="Receiver Operating Characteristic Curve",
  xlab="False Positive Rate", ylab="True Positive Rate")

BH = function (p, q){
  psort = c()
  ppos = sort.list(p)
  
for (i in 1:length(p)){
  psort[i] = p[ppos[i]]
}
  
  
 crit = c( )
 for (k in 1:length(p)){
   crit[k]= ((k*q)/length(p))
 }
sig = c()
 for(j in 1:length(p)){
   if (psort[j]< crit[j]){
     sig[j] = 1
   }else{
     sig[j]= 0
   }
 }
return(sig)

}


Pad = function(p){
  psort = c()
  ppos = sort.list(p)
  
for (i in 1:length(p)){
  psort[i] = p[ppos[i]]
}
  adj = c()
  for (k in 1:length(psort)){
    ko = 0
    ki = 0
    kio = c()
    ko = psort[k] *(length(psort)/k)
    if (k<length(psort)){
      ki = psort[k+1] *(length(psort)/(k+1))
    }
    kio = c(ko,ki)
    adj[k]= min(kio)
  }
  Padj = c()
  for (j in 1:length(p)){
    Padj[ppos[j]] = adj[j]
  }
  return(Padj)
}


xbar = rep(0, 100)
N = 10 # number of non-zero means
mu = 2 #non 0 mean
xbar[1:N] = mu



alpha = seq(from=0,to=1,by=.01)
FDmlist= c()
TDmlist = c()
FPmlist= c()
TPmlist = c()
for ( j in 1:length(alpha)){
  FDlist = c()
TDlist = c()
  FPlist = c()
TPlist = c()

 for (i in 1:100){
  z = rnorm(100, xbar, 1)#1,000 z scores
p = 2*pnorm(-abs(z)) #  p values
p = Pad(p)
discovery = p < alpha[j]
TD = sum (discovery)
TTD =sum(p[1:N]<alpha[j])
FDR = (TD-TTD)/TD
TDR = TTD/TD
FPR = (TD-TTD)/(100-N)
TPR = TTD/ N
FDlist[i]= FDR
TDlist[i]=TDR
FPlist[i]= FPR
TPlist[i]=TPR
 }

FDmlist[j]= mean(FDlist)
TDmlist[j]=mean(TDlist)
FPmlist[j]= mean(FPlist)
TPmlist[j]=mean(TPlist)
}

plot(FDmlist,TDmlist, main="False Discovery Rate vs True Discovery rate(adjusted)",
  xlab="False Discovery rate", ylab="True Discovery rate")
plot(FPmlist,TPmlist, main="Receiver Operating Characteristic Curve(adjusted)",
  xlab="False Positive Rate", ylab="True Positive Rate")
```
